snippet: All of the victims had stab wounds, and a suicide note was found on the body of Jong Lee, police said, leading the authorities to believe that Mr. Lee killed his wife and son before killing himself.
abstract: Police say Queens man Jong Lee killed his wife and 15-year-old son before setting their apartment on fire and killing himself; all of the victims had stab wounds, and a suicide note indicating financial strife was found on man's body.

byline.original: By JIHA HAM and JOHN SURICO
byline.contributor: Emma G. Fitzsimmons, J. David Goodman and Marc Santora contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: All of the victims had stab wounds, and a suicide note was found on the body of Jong Lee, police said, leading the authorities to believe that Mr. Lee killed his wife and son before killing himself.

headline.main: In Queens, a Triple Killing Shows Signs of Financial Strife
headline.print_headline: In a Triple Killing, Signs of Financial Strife
